subject: Sales
title: Multi-Party Negotiations
description: A quick win: understand Multi-Party Negotiations.

hook.text: Two people at a table is simple. Add five stakeholders with different agendas and chaos erupts.

buildup.text: Multi-party talks multiply complexity. Each new person adds interests, constraints, and ego.

discovery.text: The key is coalition building. Find your allies before the group ever sits down together.

twist.text: Coalitions shift constantly. Today's ally becomes tomorrow's opponent if their interests change.

climax.text: Map every stakeholder's interest before the room fills. Know who blocks, supports, and swings.

punchline.text: In group talks, the real deal happens before the meeting.

quiz.question: What is the key strategy in multi-party negotiations?
